Data Fields
devfifo_cfg_t Struct Reference
Device FIFO

#include <devfifo.h>

Collaboration diagram for devfifo_cfg_t:

Detailed Description

This is used for the configuration of the device.

Data Fields

const device_t * dev
 The underlying device.
 
char * buffer
 The buffer for the fifo.
 
int size
 The size of the fifo.
 
int req_getbyte
 The request used to get a byte from the device.
 
int req_setaction
 The request to set the action.
 
int event
 The event to trigger on.
